name: Jesus Christ, Our Lord, REBORN
description:
It's year 2329 and a gloomy guy from a very misterious cult that still believes in christmas travels all the way to a factory in the north pole in order to make Jesus Christ reborn.

15 minutes of pure inmmersive pixel art point-and-click adventure fun.

Probably not appropriate for little kids since it despicts human fluids and non standard intercourse

USE HEADPHONES OR TURN UP THE VOLUME OF YOU SPEAKERS FOR AN INMERSIVE EXPERIENCE

--------

Feedback is über welcome, this is our Facebook page

--------

#1 place on Godot christmas jam! Made by:
Federico Dopazo (graphics + game design)
Leandro Garber (programming + game design)
Tomás Ciccola ( sound + fx )
